author: Steven Thompson
text: I'm researching small group discussions, and trying to remember the consultant/author that gave such a terrific program last year about the meetings that he conducted to help resolve a controversy over a police issue.  One of the points he made was that seating should be in small circles, with the knees between participants no more than 4" from the knee of the next participant.  Any help?
title: Community Engagement - Looking for the Author
